author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
quote: Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief

author: Baltasar Gracian
quote: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade.

author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.

author: Sara Shepard
quote: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.

author: Greg Tamblyn
quote: Friends are people who know you really well and like you anyway.

author: Unknown
quote: True friendship is when you walk into their house and your WiFi connects automatically.

author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.

author: N.R Hart
quote: Some souls just understand each other upon meeting.

author: Len Wein
quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.

author: Unknown
quote: I made my Facebook name "Benefits," so when you add me now it says "you're friends with benefits."

author: Frank Crane
quote: A friend is someone with whom you dare to be yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is sharing openly, laughing often, trusting always and caring deeply.

author: Jenna Wortham
quote: Matching tattoos don't ensure the longevity of a friendship, any more than any other mutual hardship.

author: Unknown
quote: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.

author: Helen Keller
quote: My friends have made the story of my life.

author: David Storey
quote: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is a single soul dwelling in two bodies.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: Be careful the mistake of yesterday always lives with tomorrow.

author: Jay McInerney
quote: The capacity for friendship is God's way of apologizing for our families.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.

author: Reese Witherspoon

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.

author: Unknown
quote: There are friends, there is family, and then there are friends that become family.

author: Joel Edgerton

author: Maria Shriver
quote: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.

author: Lois Wyse

author: Hill Harper
quote: You can't build anything with a flimsy foundation. Friendship is the foundation.

author: William James
quote: We are like islands in the sea, separate on the surface but connected in the deep.

author: Amity Shlaes

author: Unknown
quote: We will always be friends til we are old and senile. Then, we can be new friends.

author: Aristotle
quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership.

author: Unknown
quote: If you find just one true friend in your lifetime, you have been truly blessed.

author: Michel de Montaigne
quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.

author: Tahar Ben Jelloun
quote: Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare - and precious as a pearl.

author: Unknown
quote: Life was meant for good friends and great adventures.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is when people know all about you but like you anyway.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him.

author: Judy Holliday
quote: Lovers have a right to betray you... friends don't.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Your friend is your field which you sow with love and reap with thanksgiving.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.

author: Voltaire
quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.

author: Thomas Moore
quote: A friendship that like love is warm; A love like friendship, steady.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.

author: Unknown
quote: True friendship isn't about being inseparable, it's being separated and nothing changes.

author: Unknown
quote: A relationship with a best friend is like a sugarcane... You can crush it, shred it, grind it, squeeze it and it's still sweet.

author: Dorothy Parker
quote: Constant use will not wear ragged the fabric of friendship.

author: Aristotle
quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.

author: A.A. Milne
quote: Piglet noticed that even though he had a Very Small Heart, it could hold a rather large amount of Gratitude.

author: Francis Bacon
quote: Friendship increases in visiting friends, but in visiting them seldom.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.

author: Isabelle Norton
quote: In a friend you find a second self.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is by far the best ending for one.

author: Shannon L. Alder
quote: A friend is not the shadow that mimics you, but the one who casts all shadows away.

author: George Washington
quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.

author: Cicero
quote: Life is nothing without friendship.

author: Douglas Pagels
quote: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Friends - They cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.

author: John Tillotson
quote: A good word is an easy obligation; but not to speak ill requires only our silence; which costs us nothing.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
quote: Stay is a charming word in a friend's vocabulary.

author: Tahar Ben Jelloun
quote: I love life in spite of all that mars it. I love friendship, jokes and laughter.

author: Marlene Dietrich
quote: It’s the friends you can call up at 4 am that matter.

author: Aristotle
quote: He who hath many friends hath none.

author: Eustace Budgell

author: Unknown

author: Kenneth Branagh
quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Friends buy you food. Best friends eat your food.

author: Bette Midler
quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
quote: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.

author: Emma Bunton

author: Ernie Banks

author: Edward Abbey

author: Betty Gilpin

author: Isabel Norton
quote: In my friend, I find a second self.

author: Sarah Dessen
quote: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.

author: Mignon McLaughlin

author: Oprah Winfrey

author: Nathanael Richmond
quote: Best friends can turn a horrible day, into one of the best days of your life.

author: Unknown
quote: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know they're always there.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends fill your life with joy, your soul with sunshine and your heart with love.

author: Turkish Proverb

author: William Glasser

author: Gertrude Stein
quote: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded.

author: Whitney Houston

author: Richelle Mead

author: Unknown
quote: Hard times will always reveal true friends.

author: Unknown

author: Heidi Wills
quote: A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.

author: William Shakespeare

author: Unknown

quote: There is no possession more valuable than a good and faithful friend.

author: Baltasar Gracian
quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.

author: Alexandre Dumas

author: Chanakya
quote: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.

author: Alfred Tennyson

author: Jennifer Lawrence

author: Unknown
quote: When it hurts to look back, and you're afraid to look ahead, you can look beside you and your best friend will be there.

author: Unknown
quote: A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.

author: Thiruvalluvar

author: Richard Bach
quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.

author: Augustine Birrell
quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: God always wants us to see things from heaven's prospective. You may not be doing much to your community but what you are is so important. You are significant.

author: Nathanael Richmond
quote: Best friends can turn a horrible day into one of the best days of your life.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: I have learned to thank God for what I cannot see, I have learned to trust God with what I cannot.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.

author: Joseph Brodsky
quote: How delightful to find a friend in everyone.

author: Katherine Mansfield

author: Henry Adams
quote: A friend in power is a friend lost.

author: Renee Olstead
quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around.

author: Jim Henson

author: Henry David Thoreau

author: W. Somerset Maugham

author: Ray Bradbury

author: Naomi Judd
quote: Solitude is creativity’s best friend, and solitude is refreshment for our souls.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Don’t walk in front of me… I may not follow Don’t walk behind me… I may not lead Walk beside me… just be my friend

author: Tennessee Williams
quote: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is the comfort that comes from knowing that even when you feel all alone, you aren't.

author: Henri Nouwen
quote: Friendship has always belonged to the core of my spiritual journey.

author: John Green

author: Epicurus
quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.

author: C.S. Lewis

author: Unknown
quote: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.

author: Charles Lamb
quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.

author: Thomas Huxley

author: Leo Buscaglia

author: Ed Cunningham
quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.

author: Jean de la Fontaine

author: Unknown

author: A.A. Milne

author: Elie Wiesel

author: Conor Oberst
quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.

author: Jodi Picoult

author: John Hay
quote: Friends are the sunshine of life.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: I love the friends that you don’t see for days. Weeks. Even months and the bond is still strong as ever.

author: James F. Byrnes

author: Unknown
quote: You and I are more than friends. We're like a really small gang.

author: Markus Zusak

author: Unknown

author: Vandi Tanko
quote: An honest enemy is better than a best friend who lies.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

quote: Friendship is the purest love.

author: Thomas Fuller

author: Amos Bronson Alcott

author: Unknown

author: Giotto di Bondone

author: Steve Maraboli
quote: Friends are medicine for a wounded heart, and vitamins for a hopeful soul.

author: Joseph Parry
quote: Make new friends, but keep the old; Those are silver, these are gold.

author: Unknown
quote: Never let your best friends get lonely... keep disturbing them.

author: A.A. Milne
quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.

author: Lilian Whiting
quote: To be rich in friends is to be poor in nothing.

author: Unknown
quote: If you have crazy friends you have everything you'll ever need.

author: Charles Peguy

author: Unknown
quote: A friend is someone who understand your past, believes in your future, and accepts you today just the way you are.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend’s success.

author: Rumi
quote: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: When friendships are real, they are not glass threads or frost work, but the solidest things we can know.

author: Sarah Desse
quote: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.

author: Dag Hammarskjold
quote: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.

author: Amy Poehler
quote: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.

author: Jesse Owens
quote: Awards become corroded. Friends gather no dust.

author: Willa Cather

author: Ethel Barrymore

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: In life have a friend that's like a mirror and shadow; Mirror doesn't lie and shadow never leaves.

author: Crystal Woods
quote: Ten minutes with a genuine friend is better than years spent with anyone less.

author: Thomas Moore
quote: Came but for friendship, and took away love.

author: Christy Evans
quote: Good friends are like stars, you don’t always see them, but you know they are there.

author: Kenny Rogers

author: Elizabeth Taylor
quote: You find out who your real friends are when you’re involved in a scandal.

author: Emilie SaintGenis

author: Anna Cummins
quote: Do not save your loving speeches for your friends till they are dead; Do not write them on their tombstones, speak them rather now instead.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
quote: Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief.

author: Unknown
quote: Stay close to people who feel like sunlight.

author: Nishan Panwar
quote: It is hard to deal with someone who smiles and pretends to like you to your face and sticks that eight inch blade in your back when you turn around.

author: Carl Jung
quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.

author: Henry Drummond
quote: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends are like walls. Sometimes you lean on them, and sometimes it's good just knowing they are there.

author: Thomas Aquinas
quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.

author: Brandi Snyder
quote: To the world you may be just one person, but to one person you may be the world.

author: Dr. Sunwolf
quote: We need at least one friend who understands what we do not say.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.

author: Unknown
quote: The only people I owe my loyalty to are those who never made me question theirs.

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
quote: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots.

author: Michael Bassey Johnson

author: John Steinbeck
quote: I got you to look after me, and you got me to look after you, and that's why.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
quote: Friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.

author: Unknown
quote: Keep talking about me behind my back, and watch God keep blessing me in front of your face.

author: Unknown
quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm & constant.

author: Corbin Bernsen
quote: I don’t have a bunch of mates. I don’t have a man cave. My wife and I, we are each other’s best friend.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

author: George Santayana
quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.

author: Marcelene Cox
quote: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed, but there will always be cracks…

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.

author: Unknown
quote: There are some people in life that make you laugh a little louder, smile a little bigger and live just a little bit better.

author: Unknown
quote: You and I are really more than friends. We're like a really small gang.

author: Terri Guillemets
quote: Friends make you smile — best friends make you giggle ’til you pee your pants.

author: Elbert Hubbard
quote: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.

author: Jane Austen
quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be.

author: Aristotle
quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.

author: Unknown
quote: You can always tell when two people are best friends because they're always having way more fun than it makes sense for them to be having.

author: Unknown
quote: The best kind of friendships are fierce lady friendships where you aggressively believe in each other, defend each other, and think the other deserves the world.

author: Unknown
quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life.

author: Jean de la Bruyere
quote: Love and friendship exclude each other.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.

author: Charles Caleb Colton
quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.

author: Rodrigo Duterte
quote: Let me be very clear: my friendship with my friends ends where the interest of the country begins.

author: Unknown
quote: You know someone's special to you when y... it's pure magic. If you ever find someone like this in your life, never let them go.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: If you never listen, you can't see. The devil has got so many people so disconnected that they cannot even listen or even sense when the Lord is speaking.

author: Robert Blair
quote: Friendship! Mysterious cement of the soul, Sweetener of life, and solder of society.

author: Irish Proverb
quote: A good friend is like a four-leaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have.

author: Jim Morrison
quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.

author: Mufti Ismail Menk
quote: We fear our enemy but the bigger and real fear is that of a fake friend who is sweetest to your face and most vile behind your back.

author: Thomas Aquinas
quote: Moral science is better occupied when treating of friendship than of justice.

author: Unknown
quote: A best friend is like a four-leaf clover: hard to find and lucky to have.

author: Christie Brinkley
quote: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.

author: Robert Kraft
quote: Loyalty and friendship trumps politics for me.

author: Anais Nin
quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.

author: June Jordan
quote: But, based on my friendship with Evie as young mothers, I started going on freedom rides in 1966.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: Christians we cannot be allowed to be fractured at a time like this. There are more of us, there are more of light in us than in the agents of darkness.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: I am glad you are here with me. Here at the end of all things, Sam.

author: C. S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art… It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.

author: Aristotle
quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.

author: Meghan Markle
quote: If we treated ourselves as well as we treated our best friend, can you imagine?

author: Unknown
quote: My friend, remember that without stupidity there wouldn't be intelligence, and without ugliness there wouldn't be beauty, so the world needs you after all.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

author: Lois L. Kaufman
quote: Plant a seed of friendship; reap a bouquet of happiness.

author: Doe Zantamata
quote: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them‰Û your smile, your hope and your courage.

author: Rachel Cohn
quote: It's bullshit to think of friendship and romance as being different. They're not. They're just variations of the same love. Variations of the same desire to be close.

author: Anais Nin
quote: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?

author: Charles Kingsley
quote: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, Can never know what true friendship means.

author: Unknown
quote: That's the price you pay for the richness of loving and knowing people in more than one place.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings.

author: Richard Bach
quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?

author: J. Paul Getty

author: William Shakespeare
quote: Words are easy, like the wind; Faithful friends are hard to find.

author: Thomas Jefferson
quote: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.

author: Elizabeth Taylor
quote: You find out who your real friends are when you're involved in a scandal.

author: Kemmy Nola
quote: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smile at you is your best friend.

author: Unknown
quote: Dear Diamond, we all know who is really a girl's best friend. Sincerely yours, Chocolate Cake.

author: Lea Michele
quote: In this lifetime, if there's anything you need, it's a best friend.

author: Amy Leigh Mercree
quote: Forever friends are a treasure chest of understanding and compassion. Cherish them.

author: Ritu Ghatourey
quote: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after yall not friends anymore.

author: Unknown
quote: True friends are those rare people who come to find you in dark places and lead you back into the light.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Ein Freund ist ein Mensch, der die Melodie deines Herzen kennt und sie dir vorspielt, wenn du sie vergessen hast.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

author: Alexander Dumas

quote: To be with old friends is very warming and comforting.

author: L.M. Montgomery
quote: True friends are always together in spirit. (Anne Shirley)

quote: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.

author: Unknown
quote: Better to have an enemy who slaps you in the face than a friend who stabs you in the back.

author: Albert Camus
quote: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Arnold H. Glasgow
quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.

author: Abraham Lincoln

author: Unknown

author: The Buddha
quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

author: Virginia Tubbs

author: Groucho Marx

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Your friend is your needs answered.

author: Khalil Gibran
quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.

author: Bonnie Jensen
quote: Contrary to popular belief, going shopping is really about stopping afterward for cheesecake.

author: A.A. Milne
quote: Piglet sidled up to Pooh from behind. "Pooh!" he whispered. "Yes, Piglet?" "Nothing," said Piglet, taking Pooh's paw. "I just wanted to be sure of you.

author: Unknown
quote: My imaginary friend thinks he has problems.

quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.

quote: A good friend is like a four-leaf clover; hard to find and lucky to have.

author: Charles Eastman

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.

author: Barbara Bush
quote: Value your friendship. Value your relationships.

author: Leo Buscaglia
quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.

author: Joseph Addison
quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment is a secret which but few discover.

author: Jennie Churchill

author: Plautus
quote: Where there are friends, there is wealth.

author: Anna Deavere Smith
quote: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.

author: Unknown
quote: You are summer to my winter heart.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends listen to what you say. Best friends listen to what you don't say.

author: Buddha
quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

author: Sylvia Plath
quote: We should meet in another life, we should meet in air, me and you.

author: A.A. Milne

author: Theophile Gautier

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

quote: Sweat makes good friendship cement.

author: A.A. Milne

author: Unknown

author: Robert Southey

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Elizabeth Foley
quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.

author: Jess C. Scott
quote: Friends are the family you choose

author: Unknown
quote: Friends come and go, but enemies remain and build up.

author: Jess C. Scott
quote: Friends are the family you choose.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.

author: Titus Maccius Plautus
quote: Where there are friends, there is wealth.

author: Jane Austen

author: Unknown
quote: I'd take a nerf bullet for you.

quote: True friends are always together in spirit.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Helen Keller
quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.

author: Unknown

author: Unknown
quote: Best friends make the good times better and the hard times easier.

author: Unknown

author: George Santayana

author: Plautus
quote: Friendship is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

author: George Jean Nathan

author: Joseph Campbell
quote: Love is a friendship set to music.

author: Saint Augustine

author: Proverbs 27:9
quote: A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends don't let friends do silly things...alone.

author: Unknown
quote: Best friends: it’s a promise, not a label.

author: Arthur Brisbane
quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.

author: Patience Johnson

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief.

author: Bob Marley
quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.

author: Joseph Addison
quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.

author: Publilius Syrus

author: Oprah Winfrey

author: Unknown
quote: Best friends are people who make your problems their problems, just so you don’t have to go through them alone.

author: C. S. Lewis
quote: Eros will have naked bodies; Friendship naked personalities.

author: Audrey Hepburn
quote: True friends are families which you can select.

author: Unknown
quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.

author: Unknown
quote: A best friend is like a four leaf clover, hard to find, lucky to have.

author: Nicole Richie
quote: True friends are like diamond—bright, beautiful, valuable and always in style.

author: Christopher Hitchens
quote: What do you most value in your friends? Their continued existence.

author: William Blake
quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.

quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.

author: William Feather

author: William Temple
quote: Man’s wisdom is his best friend; folly his worst enemy.

author: J.M. Laurence

author: Jeremy Taylor
quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.

author: Lauren Conrad
quote: Some people are willing to betray years of friendship just to get a little bit of the spotlight.

author: Unknown
quote: I like you a lottle. It's like a little, except a lot.

author: Donna Roberts
quote: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.

author: Lou Holtz
quote: When the bank asks me about my assets, I include my friendship with Regis Philbin.

author: King Solomon
quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.

author: Unknown
quote: I'd walk through fire for my best friend. Well, not fire because that's dangerous. But a super humid room... well not too humid, because you know... my hair.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: I don't want to settle down because God has satisfied me and heard my prayers. I want to stay hungry and thirsty for the things of God.

author: Sophocles
quote: You win the victory when you yield to friends.

author: Jess C. Scott
quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.

author: Sydney Smith
quote: Madam, I have been looking for a person who disliked gravy all my life; let us swear eternal friendship.

author: Unknown
quote: A true friend cares like a mom, scolds like a dad, teases like a sister, irritates like a brother and loves more than a lover.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.

author: Lord Byron
quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!

author: Thiruvalluvar
quote: To embrace the whole world in friendship is wisdom. This wisdom is not changeable like the flowers that bloom and fade.

author: Unknown
quote: Our phones fall, we panic. Our friends fall, we laugh.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: Tis a great confidence in a friend to tell him your faults; greater to tell him his.

author: Anna Cummins
quote: Do not save your loving speeches for your friends till they are dead; do not write them on their tombstones, speak them rather now instead.

author: Ritu Ghatourey
quote: Time alone can prove the worth offriendship. As time goes by we losethe the false ones and keep thebest. True friends stay when all therest are gone.

author: Dorothy Parker
quote: Constant use had not worn ragged the fabric of their friendship.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: A true friend stabs you in the front.

author: Chelsea Handler
quote: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: Thank God #EVEN# #THOUGH# in bad times not only in your good; this is a graduated form of gratitude.

author: Charles de Montesquieu
quote: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones.

author: Bernard Meltzer
quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: So long as we love we serve; so long as we are loved by others, I would almost say that we are indispensable; and no man is useless while he has a friend.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend.

author: Charles Kingsley
quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken it can rarely be put back together exactly the same way.

author: Thalia
quote: Friendship is something that is cultivated.

author: Unknown
quote: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society.

author: S.E. Hinton
quote: If you have two friends in your lifetime, you’re lucky. If you have one good friend, you’re more than lucky.

author: Unknown
quote: Best friends don’t necessarily have to talk every day. They don’t even need to talk for weeks. But when they do, it’s like they never stopped talking.

author: A.A. Milne
quote: It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?

author: Unknown
quote: Best friend: someone you can only stay mad at for so long because you have important things to talk about.

author: Confucius
quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.

author: Bernard Branson
quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.

author: Unknown
quote: Only a true friend will tell you to your face what others are saying behind your back.

author: Samuel Johnson
quote: The feeling of friendship is like that of being comfortably filled with roast beef; love, like being enlivened with champagne.

author: Hiro Mashima
quote: Is that your reason for fighting?! We're different!!! We fight for the sake of our injured friends!!! No matter if our opponents are humans, demons, or even gods!!!

author: Doris Lessing
quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel.

author: Unknown
quote: Never forget who was there when you needed them.

author: Henry Ford
quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

author: Rebecca Wells
quote: You know how some people, when they're together, they somehow make you feel more hopeful? Make you feel like the world is not the insane place it really is?

author: Publilius Syrus
quote: A friendship that can end never really began.

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.

author: Reese Witherspoon
quote: I don’t know what I would have done so many times in my life if I hadn’t had my girlfriends.

author: Sabrina Bryan
quote: Friendship is the complete explanation of what a Cheetah Girl is - if you have that true friendship, you can conquer anything you want.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
quote: Laughter is not a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is the best ending for one.

author: Mencius
quote: Friendship with a man is friendship with his virtue.

author: Unknown
quote: Your friends should motivate and inspire you. Your circle should be well rounded and supportive. Keep it tight. Quality over quantity, always.

author: Rainbow Rowell
quote: I don’t trust anybody. Not anybody. And the more that I care about someone, the more sure I am they’re going to get tired of me and take off.

author: Sophie Kinsella
quote: Relationships are all about trust and equality. If one person shares, then the other person should share, too.

author: London Mond
quote: Most people want to see you to do better, but not doing better than them.

author: Steven Van Zandt
quote: Rock n' roll as a genre is different from pop and hip hop: it is about bands, and that for me suggests brotherhood, family, friendship and community.

author: Lord Byron
quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.

author: Unknown
quote: Find friends who aren't too proud to pray for you. To cry for you. To hope for you. To ask God to be one with you. That's what's real.

author: Rachel Simmons
quote: There are no shortcuts to genuine friendship. Relationships are built over time.

author: Euripides
quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.

author: Margaret Lee Runbeck
quote: Silence make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying, but the never needing to say that counts.

author: C. S. Lewis
quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.

author: Unknown
quote: That moment when you, a queen, come across another queen, and discuss how to maximize your joint slay.

author: Jeremy Taylor
quote: Love is friendship set on fire.

author: Charles Darwin
quote: Fate chooses your relations, you choose your friends.

author: Tahar Ben Jelloun
quote: Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare—and precious as a pearl.

author: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.

author: Megan McCafferty
quote: Girls will get together just to get together. Guys need an activity as an excuse. Otherwise it’s too homo for them to handle.

author: Virginia Woolf
quote: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.

author: Nargis Fakhri
quote: Every friendship is different because everyone's personality is different.

author: Mencius
quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.

author: Oliver Goldsmith
quote: Pity and friendship are two passions incompatible with each other.

author: John D. Rockefeller
quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.

author: Thomas Aquinas
quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.

author: Marlene Dietrich
quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.

author: Jodie Foster
quote: My definition of a friend is somebody who adores you even though they know the things you're most ashamed of.

author: Unknown
quote: The one who doesn't tell you what you want to hear, but tells you what you need to hear. Keep that.

author: Robert Brault
quote: As a friend, you first give your understanding, then you try to understand.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: Learn to eat with your enemies all around you but most of all thank God for his presence. Keep your eyes fixed to the presence of God in the presence of your enemies.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

author: Unknown
quote: Don't worry, I got your back.

author: P.C. Cast
quote: If you have good friends, no matter how much life is sucking , they can make you laugh.

author: Liz Fenton
quote: A true best friend loves you even when it seems like you’ve gone off the deep end.

author: Walter Winchell
quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.

author: Unknown
quote: If Barbie is so popular, why do you have to buy her friends?

author: Erich Maria Remarque
quote: Love should not be polluted with friendship.

author: Mario Puzo
quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.

author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
quote: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him.

author: John Leonard
quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.

author: Joan Jett
quote: You got nothing to lose. You don't lose when you lose fake friends.

author: Proverbs
quote: A sweet friendship refreshes the soul.

author: N. R. Hart
quote: Some souls just understand each other upon meeting.

author: Jim Henson
quote: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.

author: Jane Austen
quote: There is nothing I wouldn't do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves; it is not my nature.

author: Tim Finn
quote: I think quite a lot of people have a friendship or a love that's gone like that and it never quite reconciles properly.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

author: Anna Taylor
quote: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.

author: Nausicaa Twila
quote: There are rare people who will show up at the right time, help you through the hard times and stay into your best times… Those are the keepers.

author: Francesco Guicciardini
quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.

author: William Shakespeare
quote: ...Who could refrain, That had a heart to love, and in that heart Courage to make love known?

author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
quote: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.

author: Joan Powers
quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.

author: Socrates
quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm & constant.

author: C.J. Langenhoven
quote: Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected.

author: Albert Camus
quote: How can sincerity be a condition of friendship? A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.

author: Unknown
quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.

author: Wole Soyinka
quote: I take friendship very seriously.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.

author: Bill Watterson
quote: Things are never quite as scary when you have a best friend.

author: Charles Lamb
quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected.

author: Unknown
quote: No one will ever be as entertained by us as us.

author: J.D. Salinger
quote: I am always saying "Glad to've met you" to somebody I'm not at all glad I met. If you want to stay alive, you have to say that stuff, though.

author: Ann Patchett
quote: Writing is a job, a talent, but it's also the place to go in your head. It is the imaginary friend you drink your tea with in the afternoon.

author: Unknown
quote: Notice the people who are happy for your happiness and sad for your sadness. They're the ones who deserve special places in your heart.

author: St. Jerome
quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Friendship is a two way street not a one way road.

author: Patience Johnson
quote: Man's panic does not produce God's power.....sometimes you need to pray before you post on social media.

author: Henry van Dyke
quote: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.

author: Aristotle
quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.

author: Unknown
quote: You're pretty much my most favorite of all time in the history of ever.

author: Unknown
quote: Cheers to low maintenance friends, the ones who understand life gets busy but when we see each other, there's nothing but love.

author: German Proverb
quote: Better an honest enemy than a false friend.

author: Unknown
quote: You are gold, baby. Solid gold.

author: Unknown
quote: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.

author: Marcel Proust
quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.

author: Unknown
quote: I don't know what's tighter, our jeans or our friendship.

author: William Rotsler
quote: How rare and wonderful is that flash of a moment when we realize we have discovered a friend.

author: Laurence J. Peter
quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you’ve made a fool of yourself he doesn’t feel you’ve done a permanent job.

author: Faye Hall
quote: True love is finding your soulmate in your best friend.

author: Eugene Kennedy
quote: Friendship is something whose depth fits human aspirations and fulfills human possibilities.

author: Marlene Dietrich
quote: It’s the friends you can call up at 4am that matter.

author: Sarah Valdez
quote: A friend is one of the best things you can be and the greatest things you can have.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art.... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.

author: Unknown
quote: Friends listen to what you say. Best friends listen to what you don’t say.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quote: A false friend and a shadow attend only while the sun shines.

author: Unknown
quote: Some talk to you in their free time and some free their time to talk to you. Learn the difference.

author: Unknown
quote: There's nothing better than a good friend, except for a good friend with chocolate.

author: George Washington
quote: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.

author: Samuel Butler
quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.

author: Petrarch
quote: Suspicion is the cancer of friendship.

author: Nigerian Proverb
quote: Hold a true friend with both your hands.

author: William James
quote: Wherever you are, it's your friends who make your world.

author: William Hazlitt
quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!

author: Unknown
quote: Surround yourself with people who talk about visions and ideas. Not people.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
quote: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.

author: Hubert H. Humphrey
quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

author: Thomas J. Watson
quote: Don’t make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.

author: Unknown
quote: Some souls just understand each other upon meeting.

author: Len Wein
quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he’d rather be anywhere else.

author: Mortimer Adler
quote: Conjugal love, or the friendship of spouses, can persist even after sexual desires have weakened, withered, and disappeared.

author: Unknown
quote: Want to see who your real friends are? Screw up and see who's still there.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another: 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one."

author: Unknown
quote: Life’s not about the people who act true to your face. It’s about the people who remain true behind your back.

author: Unknown
quote: Good friends are like stars. You don't always see them, but you know that they are always there.

author: Tim Cope
quote: Ultimately, it's a sense of camaraderie and friendship with local people that is core to my journeys.

author: Rainbow Rowell
quote: Holding Eleanor's hand was like holding a butterfly. Or a heartbeat. Like holding something complete, and completely alive.

author: Misty Copeland
quote: Anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you.

author: Aristotle
quote: Without friends no one would choose to live, though he had all other goods.

author: Unknown
quote: Unexpected friendships are the best ones.

author: Mandy Hale
quote: Two things you will never have to chase: True friends & true love.

author: O. Henry
quote: No friendship is an accident.

author: Unknown
quote: No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart.

author: Jane Birkin
quote: My best friend cuts my hair with kitchen scissors.

author: Jane Green
quote: I think friendship is more important than love, but that love that grows out of friendship is the very best of all.

author: Charles Caleb Colton
quote: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity.

author: Jim Henson
quote: There's not a word yet, for old friends who've just met.

author: John Churton Collins
quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.

author: Unknown
quote: A stranger stabs you in the front. A friend stabs you in the back. A boyfriend stabs you in the heart. Best friends poke each other with straws.

author: Unknown
quote: Friendship is so weird. You just pick a human you've met and you're like "yep, I like this one," and you just do stuff with them.
